strings.Value: "If you'd remained a paladin, you would have gained many powers. You could heal wounds, banish the undead..."

"No offense, but the powers a deity grants in return for your service is like a cape your master doesn't need and casts aside for you. I might not be able to claim much, but I owe all my abilities to myself only. And no one is going to take them away for disobeying."
